name: purescript-halogen-mdl
description: Material Design Lite components for Halogen

scripts.build:examples: spago bundle-app --path examples/src/*.purs --main Main --to examples/dist/app.js && parcel build examples/dist/index.html
scripts.start:examples: spago bundle-app --path examples/src/*.purs --main Main --to examples/dist/app.js && parcel examples/dist/index.html

author: Andy White
